snippet: Wayne Rooney endured more frustration on Saturday as Manchester United was held to a 0-0 draw by visiting Newcastle in the Premier League.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Manchester United and Newcastle play to 0-0 draw in Premier League; other soccer news and scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Wayne Rooney endured more frustration on Saturday as Manchester United was held to a 0-0 draw by visiting Newcastle in the Premier League.

headline.main: Newcastle Holds United to a 0-0 Draw; Bournemouth’s 125-Year Wait Ends
headline.print_headline: Newcastle Holds United to a 0-0 Draw; Bournemouth’s 125-Year Wait Ends
